synopsis.text:
Eikichi Onizuka and Ryuji Danma, the notorious duo known as Oni Baku, rule the streets on their bikes and the classrooms with their fists. Before Onizuka became Japan's legendary teacher, he and Ryuji were bosozoku, feared for their ruthless fighting skills. However, their tough-guy persona fails to impress the ladies, leading them to reevaluate their lifestyle.

In pursuit of love and maturity, the pair clean up their act and transfer to a new school, aiming to become model students. Their transformation attracts the attention of the female population, but also draws the ire of rival delinquents. As their past catches up with them, the Oni Baku duo struggle to maintain their newfound image while navigating the treacherous waters of love and friendship.

With danger lurking around every corner, Onizuka and Ryuji must rely on their old ways to protect their new lives. Will they succeed in leaving their past behind and finding love, or will their reputation as the Oni Baku continue to haunt them? Join Onizuka and Ryuji in this thrilling prequel to "Great Teacher Onizuka" as they embark on a wild, action-packed journey of self-discovery and romance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
